channel.title: Help Please?
channel.description:
Can someone help me with a couple things please?
[b][u]Server Problem[/u][/b]
Is it possible to change the colour of the text of what your character says or do i hvae to put like "cyan:my text here" each time? and if so how?
[b][u]Client Problem[/u][/b]
Is it possible to change the colour of the text of what your character says or do i hvae to put like "cyan:my text here" each time? and if so how?
I know it is basically the same question, but they are about two different things.
Thanks in advance
- G . ε . Z . z . @ -
